attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the interests of road safety sneezing whilst driving should be outlawed as it is not possible to keep your eyes open during a sneeze.  offenders should be issued a £100 fixed penalty (which goes directly into the MP's pension fund).  passengers will have a legal duty to keep written notes of drivers who sneeze at the wheel detailing times, locations, speed of vehicle, road conditions, traffic density and number of sneezes.  passengers who do not keep notes should be fined up to a maximum of £1000 or three months in a courthouse holding cell.  passengers notes should be delivered by hand daily to their local police commandant.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
